::Shadow Wing::

She emerged from the chamber fully healed.  She felt her strength had 
returned to her.  She ran out of the Ark and looked to see that 
Lunarpine was still alive.  She called out to him, "Lunarpine, You 
alright?" She flew to his side and transformed into bot mode.  She 
could see that his optics were damaged.  She grabbed his hand and put 
it on her shoulder,"I'll be your seeing eye owl." She drew her dagger 
with her good hand and threw it at Ares.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine falls back in an immense amount of pain, he'd stopped 
Ares 
> from doing more harm, unfortunately the cost was 92% of his optical 
> scanners. he no longer could see any details around him. just 
shapes 
> and blurs of movement.his olfactory sensors were still functioning 
> though after that last shot he yook he didn't know for how long, 
> Lunarpine transformed to wolf mode and used his sense of smell to 
> head toward the ark. he was prepared to attack anything that got 
> between him and the ark. he just hoped that it wasn't Maximal.
> 
> "Lunarpine to maximals I've taken heavy damage and need some cover 
> fire. if you're close identify yourself, I don't want to avoid any 
> friendly fire situations if I can." Lunarpines warning could be 
heard 
> from both sides. he just hoped the enemy was to bust with the other 
> Maximals to bother him. Ares scent didn't seem to be following him. 
> This wolf hoped that the ram was as damagedas he was if not more.
> 
> It was a good thing he'd stayed here for a short time, he could 
smell 
> his way around to make do.
>
